resources.string: Cien Montaditos is a lively bar known for its variety of Spanish-style sandwiches and affordable drinks.
The Museo del Prado is Spain\'s premier art museum, featuring an extensive collection of European masterpieces.
Retiro Park is a sprawling green space in the heart of Madrid, offering tranquil lakes, manicured gardens, and cultural events.
Plaza de España is a bustling square adorned with majestic statues and a central fountain, surrounded by historic buildings.
Riu Plaza Rooftop offers breathtaking panoramic views of Madrid\'s skyline, making it the perfect spot to enjoy sunset cocktails.
The Royal Palace of Madrid is a grandiose architectural marvel and the official residence of the Spanish royal family.
Kapital Club is a renowned nightlife destination known for its multiple floors of music, diverse crowds, and energetic atmosphere.
